name: Alternating or Supinated Dumbbell Biceps Curl
cues: Stand tall with a dumbbell in each hand, arms at your sides, elbows tucked
Curl one dumbbell up while rotating your palm to face up (supinate) as you lift
Squeeze at the top, then lower under control
Alternate arms with each rep, or perform both arms simultaneously for supinated curls
Focus on a full range of motion
Use a moderate weight to maintain good form
